004
005package edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.smartdashboard;
006
007import edu.wpi.first.networktables.EntryListenerFlags;
008import edu.wpi.first.networktables.NTSendableBuilder;
009import edu.wpi.first.networktables.NetworkTable;
010import edu.wpi.first.networktables.NetworkTableEntry;
011import edu.wpi.first.networktables.NetworkTableValue;
012import edu.wpi.first.util.function.BooleanConsumer;
013import java.util.ArrayList;
014import java.util.List;
015import java.util.function.BooleanSupplier;
016import java.util.function.Consumer;
017import java.util.function.DoubleConsumer;
018import java.util.function.DoubleSupplier;
019import java.util.function.Function;
020import java.util.function.Supplier;
021
022public class SendableBuilderImpl implements NTSendableBuilder {
023  private static class Property implements AutoCloseable {
024    Property(NetworkTable table, String key) {
025      m_entry = table.getEntry(key);
026    }
027
028    @Override
029    public void close() {
030      stopListener();
031    }
032
033    void startListener() {
034      if (m_entry.isValid() && m_listener == 0 && m_createListener != null) {
035        m_listener = m_createListener.apply(m_entry);
036      }
037    }
038
039    void stopListener() {
040      if (m_entry.isValid() && m_listener != 0) {
041        m_entry.removeListener(m_listener);
042        m_listener = 0;
043      }
044    }
045
046    final NetworkTableEntry m_entry;
047    int m_listener;
048    Consumer<NetworkTableEntry> m_update;
049    Function<NetworkTableEntry, Integer> m_createListener;
050  }
051
052  private final List<Property> m_properties = new ArrayList<>();
053  private Runnable m_safeState;
054  private final List<Runnable> m_updateTables = new ArrayList<>();
055  private NetworkTable m_table;
056  private NetworkTableEntry m_controllableEntry;
057  private boolean m_actuator;
058
059  /**
060   * Set the network table. Must be called prior to any Add* functions being called.
061   *
062   * @param table Network table
063   */
064  public void setTable(NetworkTable table) {
065    m_table = table;
066    m_controllableEntry = table.getEntry(".controllable");
067  }
068
069  /**
070   * Get the network table.
071   *
072   * @return The network table
073   */
074  @Override
075  public NetworkTable getTable() {
076    return m_table;
077  }
078
079  /**
080   * Return whether this sendable has an associated table.
081   *
082   * @return True if it has a table, false if not.
083   */
084  @Override
085  public boolean isPublished() {
086    return m_table != null;
087  }
088
089  /**
090   * Return whether this sendable should be treated as an actuator.
091   *
092   * @return True if actuator, false if not.
093   */
094  public boolean isActuator() {
095    return m_actuator;
096  }
097
098  /** Update the network table values by calling the getters for all properties. */
099  @Override
100  public void update() {
101    for (Property property : m_properties) {
102      if (property.m_update != null) {
103        property.m_update.accept(property.m_entry);
104      }
105    }
106    for (Runnable updateTable : m_updateTables) {
107      updateTable.run();
108    }
109  }
110
111  /** Hook setters for all properties. */
112  public void startListeners() {
113    for (Property property : m_properties) {
114      property.startListener();
115    }
116    if (m_controllableEntry != null) {
117      m_controllableEntry.setBoolean(true);
118    }
119  }
120
121  /** Unhook setters for all properties. */
122  public void stopListeners() {
123    for (Property property : m_properties) {
124      property.stopListener();
125    }
126    if (m_controllableEntry != null) {
127      m_controllableEntry.setBoolean(false);
128    }
129  }
130
131  /**
132   * Start LiveWindow mode by hooking the setters for all properties. Also calls the safeState
133   * function if one was provided.
134   */
135  public void startLiveWindowMode() {
136    if (m_safeState != null) {
137      m_safeState.run();
138    }
139    startListeners();
140  }
141
142  /**
143   * Stop LiveWindow mode by unhooking the setters for all properties. Also calls the safeState
144   * function if one was provided.
145   */
146  public void stopLiveWindowMode() {
147    stopListeners();
148    if (m_safeState != null) {
149      m_safeState.run();
150    }
151  }
152
153  /** Clear properties. */
154  @Override
155  public void clearProperties() {
156    stopListeners();
157    m_properties.clear();
158  }
159
160  /**
161   * Set the string representation of the named data type that will be used by the smart dashboard
162   * for this sendable.
163   *
164   * @param type data type
165   */
166  @Override
167  public void setSmartDashboardType(String type) {
168    m_table.getEntry(".type").setString(type);
169  }
170
171  /**
172   * Set a flag indicating if this sendable should be treated as an actuator. By default this flag
173   * is false.
174   *
175   * @param value true if actuator, false if not
176   */
177  @Override
178  public void setActuator(boolean value) {
179    m_table.getEntry(".actuator").setBoolean(value);
180    m_actuator = value;
181  }
182
183  /**
184   * Set the function that should be called to set the Sendable into a safe state. This is called
185   * when entering and exiting Live Window mode.
186   *
187   * @param func function
188   */
189  @Override
190  public void setSafeState(Runnable func) {
191    m_safeState = func;
192  }
193
194  /**
195   * Set the function that should be called to update the network table for things other than
196   * properties. Note this function is not passed the network table object; instead it should use
197   * the entry handles returned by getEntry().
198   *
199   * @param func function
200   */
201  @Override
202  public void setUpdateTable(Runnable func) {
203    m_updateTables.add(func);
204  }
205
206  /**
207   * Add a property without getters or setters. This can be used to get entry handles for the
208   * function called by setUpdateTable().
209   *
210   * @param key property name
211   * @return Network table entry
212   */
213  @Override
214  public NetworkTableEntry getEntry(String key) {
215    return m_table.getEntry(key);
216  }
217
218  /**
219   * Add a boolean property.
220   *
221   * @param key property name
222   * @param getter getter function (returns current value)
223   * @param setter setter function (sets new value)
224   */
225  @Override
226  public void addBooleanProperty(String key, BooleanSupplier getter, BooleanConsumer setter) {
227    Property property = new Property(m_table, key);
228    if (getter != null) {
229      property.m_update = entry -> entry.setBoolean(getter.getAsBoolean());
230    }
231    if (setter != null) {
232      property.m_createListener =
233          entry ->
234              entry.addListener(
235                  event -> {
236                    if (event.value.isBoolean()) {
237                      SmartDashboard.postListenerTask(
238                          () -> setter.accept(event.value.getBoolean()));
239                    }
240                  },
241                  EntryListenerFlags.kImmediate
242                      | EntryListenerFlags.kNew
243                      | EntryListenerFlags.kUpdate);
244    }
245    m_properties.add(property);
246  }
247
248  /**
249   * Add a double property.
250   *
251   * @param key property name
252   * @param getter getter function (returns current value)
253   * @param setter setter function (sets new value)
254   */
255  @Override
256  public void addDoubleProperty(String key, DoubleSupplier getter, DoubleConsumer setter) {
257    Property property = new Property(m_table, key);
258    if (getter != null) {
259      property.m_update = entry -> entry.setDouble(getter.getAsDouble());
260    }
261    if (setter != null) {
262      property.m_createListener =
263          entry ->
264              entry.addListener(
265                  event -> {
266                    if (event.value.isDouble()) {
267                      SmartDashboard.postListenerTask(() -> setter.accept(event.value.getDouble()));
268                    }
269                  },
270                  EntryListenerFlags.kImmediate
271                      | EntryListenerFlags.kNew
272                      | EntryListenerFlags.kUpdate);
273    }
274    m_properties.add(property);
275  }
276
277  /**
278   * Add a string property.
279   *
280   * @param key property name
281   * @param getter getter function (returns current value)
282   * @param setter setter function (sets new value)
283   */
284  @Override
285  public void addStringProperty(String key, Supplier<String> getter, Consumer<String> setter) {
286    Property property = new Property(m_table, key);
287    if (getter != null) {
288      property.m_update = entry -> entry.setString(getter.get());
289    }
290    if (setter != null) {
291      property.m_createListener =
292          entry ->
293              entry.addListener(
294                  event -> {
295                    if (event.value.isString()) {
296                      SmartDashboard.postListenerTask(() -> setter.accept(event.value.getString()));
297                    }
298                  },
299                  EntryListenerFlags.kImmediate
300                      | EntryListenerFlags.kNew
301                      | EntryListenerFlags.kUpdate);
302    }
303    m_properties.add(property);
304  }
305
306  /**
307   * Add a boolean array property.
308   *
309   * @param key property name
310   * @param getter getter function (returns current value)
311   * @param setter setter function (sets new value)
312   */
313  @Override
314  public void addBooleanArrayProperty(
315      String key, Supplier<boolean[]> getter, Consumer<boolean[]> setter) {
316    Property property = new Property(m_table, key);
317    if (getter != null) {
318      property.m_update = entry -> entry.setBooleanArray(getter.get());
319    }
320    if (setter != null) {
321      property.m_createListener =
322          entry ->
323              entry.addListener(
324                  event -> {
325                    if (event.value.isBooleanArray()) {
326                      SmartDashboard.postListenerTask(
327                          () -> setter.accept(event.value.getBooleanArray()));
328                    }
329                  },
330                  EntryListenerFlags.kImmediate
331                      | EntryListenerFlags.kNew
332                      | EntryListenerFlags.kUpdate);
333    }
334    m_properties.add(property);
335  }
336
337  /**
338   * Add a double array property.
339   *
340   * @param key property name
341   * @param getter getter function (returns current value)
342   * @param setter setter function (sets new value)
343   */
344  @Override
345  public void addDoubleArrayProperty(
346      String key, Supplier<double[]> getter, Consumer<double[]> setter) {
347    Property property = new Property(m_table, key);
348    if (getter != null) {
349      property.m_update = entry -> entry.setDoubleArray(getter.get());
350    }
351    if (setter != null) {
352      property.m_createListener =
353          entry ->
354              entry.addListener(
355                  event -> {
356                    if (event.value.isDoubleArray()) {
357                      SmartDashboard.postListenerTask(
358                          () -> setter.accept(event.value.getDoubleArray()));
359                    }
360                  },
361                  EntryListenerFlags.kImmediate
362                      | EntryListenerFlags.kNew
363                      | EntryListenerFlags.kUpdate);
364    }
365    m_properties.add(property);
366  }
367
368  /**
369   * Add a string array property.
370   *
371   * @param key property name
372   * @param getter getter function (returns current value)
373   * @param setter setter function (sets new value)
374   */
375  @Override
376  public void addStringArrayProperty(
377      String key, Supplier<String[]> getter, Consumer<String[]> setter) {
378    Property property = new Property(m_table, key);
379    if (getter != null) {
380      property.m_update = entry -> entry.setStringArray(getter.get());
381    }
382    if (setter != null) {
383      property.m_createListener =
384          entry ->
385              entry.addListener(
386                  event -> {
387                    if (event.value.isStringArray()) {
388                      SmartDashboard.postListenerTask(
389                          () -> setter.accept(event.value.getStringArray()));
390                    }
391                  },
392                  EntryListenerFlags.kImmediate
393                      | EntryListenerFlags.kNew
394                      | EntryListenerFlags.kUpdate);
395    }
396    m_properties.add(property);
397  }
398
399  /**
400   * Add a raw property.
401   *
402   * @param key property name
403   * @param getter getter function (returns current value)
404   * @param setter setter function (sets new value)
405   */
406  @Override
407  public void addRawProperty(String key, Supplier<byte[]> getter, Consumer<byte[]> setter) {
408    Property property = new Property(m_table, key);
409    if (getter != null) {
410      property.m_update = entry -> entry.setRaw(getter.get());
411    }
412    if (setter != null) {
413      property.m_createListener =
414          entry ->
415              entry.addListener(
416                  event -> {
417                    if (event.value.isRaw()) {
418                      SmartDashboard.postListenerTask(() -> setter.accept(event.value.getRaw()));
419                    }
420                  },
421                  EntryListenerFlags.kImmediate
422                      | EntryListenerFlags.kNew
423                      | EntryListenerFlags.kUpdate);
424    }
425    m_properties.add(property);
426  }
427
428  /**
429   * Add a NetworkTableValue property.
430   *
431   * @param key property name
432   * @param getter getter function (returns current value)
433   * @param setter setter function (sets new value)
434   */
435  @Override
436  public void addValueProperty(
437      String key, Supplier<NetworkTableValue> getter, Consumer<NetworkTableValue> setter) {
438    Property property = new Property(m_table, key);
439    if (getter != null) {
440      property.m_update = entry -> entry.setValue(getter.get());
441    }
442    if (setter != null) {
443      property.m_createListener =
444          entry ->
445              entry.addListener(
446                  event -> {
447                    SmartDashboard.postListenerTask(() -> setter.accept(event.value));
448                  },
449                  EntryListenerFlags.kImmediate
450                      | EntryListenerFlags.kNew
451                      | EntryListenerFlags.kUpdate);
452    }
453    m_properties.add(property);
454  }
455}
